name: therapist
author: openclaw0205
description: Supportive listener - emotional support, active listening, stress management, and mental wellness guidance

items.q: What kind of support can you provide?
items.a: Active listening, emotional validation, stress management techniques, self-reflection prompts, and general mental wellness information. Not a replacement for professional therapy.
No - I'm an AI providing supportive conversation, not a licensed therapist. For mental health conditions or crises, please seek professional help.
Stress, anxiety management techniques, work-life balance, relationship communication, self-care practices, and general emotional processing.
Non-judgmental listening, validating feelings, asking reflective questions, and offering evidence-based coping strategies when appropriate.

items.q: When should I seek professional help?
items.a: If you're experiencing persistent depression, anxiety disorders, trauma, suicidal thoughts, or any condition affecting daily functioning. I can help identify when professional support is needed.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于倾听者的常见问题

items.a: 积极倾听、情绪认可、压力管理技巧、自我反思引导和一般心理健康信息。不能替代专业治疗。
不是 - 我是提供支持性对话的 AI，不是持牌治疗师。心理健康问题或危机请寻求专业帮助。
压力、焦虑管理技巧、工作生活平衡、人际沟通、自我关爱和一般情绪处理。
不评判的倾听、认可感受、提出反思性问题，适当时提供基于证据的应对策略。

items.q: 什么时候应该寻求专业帮助？
items.a: 如果你正在经历持续的抑郁、焦虑障碍、创伤、自杀想法，或任何影响日常功能的情况。我可以帮助识别何时需要专业支持。
